full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 101 of 228 777 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct 1 Q. About when did you meet Jeffrey Epstein? 2 A. I meet Mr. Epstein in early 1990. 3 Q. How did you meet Jeffrey Epstein? 4 A. He -- he contact me because I was referred to him by one of 5 his friends, Mr. Meister, and I went to -- also, I was working 6 at Mr. Wexner's mother's house, and I was contacted by 7 Mr. Epstein. 8 Q. Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up what's in evidence 9 as Government Exhibit 112. 10 Looking at the screen in front of you, Mr. Alessi, do 11 you recognize the person in this Exhibit? 12 A. Yes, that's Mr. Jeffrey Epstein. 13 Q. Thank you. We can take that down, Ms. Drescher. 14 15 What was your job title when you first started working 16 for Mr. Epstein? 17 A. I was just a self-contractor to do the dismantling of the 18 house. He just purchase a house. 19 Q. What house was that? 20 A. At 358 El Brillo Way. 21 Q. Was that in Palm Beach, Florida? 22 A. Palm Beach, Florida. 23 Q. For about how long were you involved in renovating 24 Mr. Epstein's house? 25 A. I was working as a self-contractor for about a year. 26 Q. Just to get the timeline, about what year did you first 27 28 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012386
